revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)

|brand = Zidoo |model = X9 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = S |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 12/08/2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Zidoo_X9S |wlclass = AC600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = media streamer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AGN7-X9S |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Realtek;RTD1295;RTD1295DD; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.4 GHz<!-- 1.4 GHz --> |gpu1chip1 = Mali;-T820 MP3; |gpu1_cores = 3 |gpu1_type = ARM |gpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |gpu1spd = <!-- gpu speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Toshiba;016G70; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Android;6.0;Marshmallow;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SATA 3.0, HDMI, TF Card slot, |exp_minipcie_num = 3 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_hdmi_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.0, HDMI in/out, TOSLINK / Analog Audio out, 4K, IR receiver, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt (NAS)
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/18/2016 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = 6970123910064 |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07DXJTY2F |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B01LWL88BM |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8821AU; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 433 |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Realtek]] RTD1295DD @1.4GHz :(Quad Core ARM Cortex-A53) *GPU: ARM Mali-T820 MP3 (3-core) *Flash: 16GB (eMMC) :[[Toshiba]] 016G70 (current) :[[Samsung]] AWPD3R (first models) *RAM: ''SK hynix'' 2GB (DDR3) *WLAN: [[Realtek]] RTL8821AU (802.11abgn+ac), BT 4.0 LE *Ethernet: 1x GbE RJ45 (10/100/1000Mbps) *USB: 2x USB 2.0, 1x USB 3.0 *Operating System: Android 6.0 (Marshmallow)
===Interfaces=== *1x TF card reader SD card interface :(support 1/2/4/8/16/32 GB) *2x USB 2.0 port, 1x USB 3.0 port *1x SATA 3.0 (6 Gbps) *1x Composite video and audio port *1x S/SPDIF (2CH, 5.1CH), 1x IR receiver *1x VFD Vacuum Fluorescent Display (VFD)
===Video/Audio=== *HDR, 10-bit HEVC/H.265 up to 4K @60fps :H.264 up to 4K @60fps, VP9 up to 4K @60fps *Automatic frame rate switching :Blu-ray better compatibility :Powerful subtitles, support MVC ISO, MVC MKV :Built in ZDMC (Base on kodi 16.0) *HD audio (7.1ch) decode and passthrough
===HDMI=== *HDMI 2.0a output, Support 4K @60fps, support HD Audio (7.1CH), support 23.976 and 29.94 *HDMI 2.0a input, Support PIP, HDMI IN stream recording and stream output via UPD/RTSP etc...
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = ? |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
